column4: Ok.. so now I feel like a total moron.. but lets run this by the channel. Would a cdrom slaved on an IDE controller not play nice sometimes if the master HD on the same controller was having issues, or are data xferrs isolated on the cable?
I'm guessing that having a master with problems could affect a slave.. yes
I hear the people in #winehq are really interested in that *hint* *hint* ;)
but as with most other new games.. it will probably not run
